alert.note: Alert for Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 3:08PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Nassau, north central Baker, southwestern Camden, southeastern Ware and central Charlton Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 307 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kings Ferry, or 7 miles east of Folkston, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Kingsland, Hilliard, Folkston, Stephen Foster State Park, Yulee, Homeland and Kings Ferry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
